titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C32

body.ab:
<lb n="c57-0168__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.14" unit="tei:head"/>Walton
in continuation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__4"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.02" unit="tei:date"/>August
13th<lb n="c57-0168__main__5"/>You
have read this strange & terrific story,
<lb n="c57-0168__main__6"/>Margaret
and
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>do not
you
feel your blood
con<lb n="c57-0168__main__7"/>gealed
with
horror Mine oftendid as he <lb n="c57-0168__main__8"/>related it<lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>
like that <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__2"/>which even <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__3"/>now curdles
<lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__4"/>mine â€“ <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29284__Start"/>When<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29284__End"/>Sometimes
seized with
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sudden agony
he <lb n="c57-0168__main__9"/>could not continue his
tale,
at
others
his voice
broken
<lb n="c57-0168__main__10"/>yet
piercing <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29311__Start"/>described some of the scenes<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29311__End"/>uttered
the words
of which it is<lb n="c57-0168__main__11"/>composed.<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29320__Start"/>he had passed<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29320__End"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29323__Start"/>through<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29323__End"/> â€“
His fine & lovely <lb n="c57-0168__main__12"/>eyes
<metamark>^</metamark>were
now lighted up
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>with indignation
now subdued
<lb n="c57-0168__main__13"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
downcast
sorrow
&
infinite wretchedness. Sometimes <lb n="c57-0168__main__14"/>he commanded his countenance &
tones
<lb n="c57-0168__main__15"/>and related the most horrible incidents <lb n="c57-0168__main__16"/>with a
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29376__Start"/>smothered<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29376__End"/>tranquil voice
suppressing every <lb n="c57-0168__main__17"/>mark of
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29385__Start"/>indi<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29385__End"/> agitation â€“ <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29390__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29390__End"/>then
like a vol<lb n="c57-0168__main__18"/>cano bursting
forth
his face would sud<lb n="c57-0168__main__19"/>denly change to an expression of the <lb n="c57-0168__main__20"/>wildest
rage
as he shrieked
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29413__Start"/>forth<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29413__End"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>out his
imprecations
^on
his persecutor.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__22"/>His tale is
connected
& told with <lb n="c57-0168__main__23"/>an appearance of the simplest
truth
<lb n="c57-0168__main__24"/>yet I own to you
my sister
that the <lb n="c57-0168__main__25"/>letters of Felix
&<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29454__Start"/>Maimouna<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29454__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Safie
which he
<lb n="c57-0168__main__26"/>shewed
me
& the apparition of the
<lb n="c57-0168__main__27"/>monster
seen from our
ship
brought <lb n="c57-0168__main__28"/>to me a greater conviction of the
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29473__Start"/>fact<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29473__End"/>truth
<lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>of his
narrative<lb n="c57-0168__main__29"/>than
his
asserverationsâ€”however
earnest & connected. Such a monster
<lb n="c57-0168__main__30"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29496__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29496__End"/>has
then real<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29503__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29503__End"/>
existence,
I
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29511__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29511__End"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29514__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29514__End"/>cannot
doubt
<lb n="c57-0168__main__31"/>it
yet I
<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29526__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e29526__End"/>am
lost in surprise
&admira<lb n="c57-0168__main__32"/>tion.
Sometimes I endeavoured to gain
from<lb n="c57-0169__main__1"/>Frankenstein
the particulars of his
formation
<lb n="c57-0169__main__2"/>but on this point he was
impenetrable. Are
you <lb n="c57-0169__main__3"/>mad, my
friend,
said
he,
or
whither does your <lb n="c57-0169__main__4"/>senseless curiosity lead
you â€“Would
you also <lb n="c57-0169__main__5"/>create for yourself
&for
the world a
dÃ¦monical<lb n="c57-0169__main__6"/>enemy
or to what
do<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29575__Start"/>es<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29575__End"/>
your questions
<lb n="c57-0169__main__7"/>tend.
Peace,
peace;
learn my
miseries &<lb n="c57-0169__main__8"/>do
not seek to
encrease
your
own.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__9"/>Frankenstein
discovered that I
detail<lb n="c57-0169__main__10"/>ed or
made notes concerning his
history
he <lb n="c57-0169__main__11"/>asked to see
them
&
himself corrected
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>and
augmented them <lb n="c57-0169__main__12"/>in many
places
but principally in
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29608__Start"/>guv<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29608__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__13"/>giving
the life & spirit
of
the
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29613__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29613__End"/>conver<lb n="c57-0169__main__14"/>sations
he held with his
enemiesâ€“Since
<lb n="c57-0169__main__15"/>you have
made an account <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>said he I
would <lb n="c57-0169__main__16"/>not that a mutilated one should go down to
<lb n="c57-0169__main__17"/>posterity. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__18"/>Thus have ten days
passed
away
<lb n="c57-0169__main__19"/>while I have listened to the strangest <lb n="c57-0169__main__20"/>tale that ever imagination formed. <lb n="c57-0169__main__21"/>My
thoughts
& every feeling of my
soul <lb n="c57-0169__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29655__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29655__End"/>have
been drunk up by the
interrest <lb n="c57-0169__main__23"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29667__Start"/>I felt in<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29667__End"/>for
my
guest <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0169.01">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/>which
this
<lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/><metamark function="displacement">x</metamark>
tale, & his <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/>own elevated <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__4"/>& gentle
man<lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__5"/>ners
have
<lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__6"/>created
I
wish<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29702__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29702__End"/>
to soothe
him
<lb n="c57-0169__main__24"/>yet
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29709__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29709__End"/>can
I
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29718__Start"/>tell<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29718__End"/>counsel
one so infinitely
miserable. <lb n="c57-0169__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29726__Start"/>Whose mind continually dwelt on horrors<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29726__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__26"/>so
destitute of every hope of
consolation
to <lb n="c57-0169__main__27"/>live<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29734__Start"/>?<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29734__End"/>
Oh no â€“
the only joy
he
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29739__Start"/>could feel<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29739__End"/>can
now
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29744__Start"/>feel<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29744__End"/> know<lb n="c57-0169__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29752__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29752__End"/>will bewhen
he composes his shattered
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29774__Start"/>mind<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29774__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>feelings
to <lb n="c57-0169__main__29"/>peace &
death â€”
Yet
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29787__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29787__End"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29790__Start"/>feeling<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29790__End"/>
he
enjoys,
<lb n="c57-0169__main__30"/>one comfort, the
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29798__Start"/>sourse<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29798__End"/>offspring
of solitude <lb n="c57-0169__main__31"/>&
delirium â€”
he
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29807__Start"/>tho<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29807__End"/> believed that
when <lb n="c57-0169__main__32"/>in dreams he
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29814__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29814__End"/>holds
converse with his friends,
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29824__Start"/>who consoled<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29824__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/>&
derives from <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/>that communion <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/>consolation
for<lb n="c57-0169__main__33"/>his miseries
or
<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29844__Start"/>instigated him<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e29844__End"/>excitement
to
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his vengeance<lb n="c57-0170__main__1"/>that
they
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29870__Start"/>were<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29870__End"/>are
not the creations of his
<lb n="c57-0170__main__2"/>fancy
but the
real
beings
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29879__Start"/>that he<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29879__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29882__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29882__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0170__left_margin__d1e29891__Start"/>beheld <del loc="c57-0170__left_margin__d1e29891__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29894__Start"/>and conversed with<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29894__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/>who
visit <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/>him from <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__3"/>the regions <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__4"/>of a
<lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__5"/>remoter world â€“This
faith gives a solemni<lb n="c57-0170__main__4"/>ty to his reveries that
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29935__Start"/>made<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29935__End"/>render
them
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29942__Start"/>peculiar<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29942__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29945__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29945__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__5"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29949__Start"/>interresting.<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29949__End"/>to me,
almost as imposing
&inte<lb n="c57-0170__main__6"/>resting
as truth.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__7"/>Our conversations
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29970__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29970__End"/>are
not always
<lb n="c57-0170__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29978__Start"/>been<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29978__End"/>
confined to his own history &
misfortunesâ€“ <lb n="c57-0170__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29982__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e29982__End"/>On
every point of general literature he <lb n="c57-0170__main__10"/>displays unbounded
knowledge
and a quick <lb n="c57-0170__main__11"/>& piercing apprehension. His eloquence is <lb n="c57-0170__main__12"/>forcible &
touching
nor can I hear
him
when <lb n="c57-0170__main__13"/>he
narrates
a pathetic
incident
or endea<lb n="c57-0170__main__14"/>vours to move the passions of pity
& love
without <lb n="c57-0170__main__15"/>tears. What a glorious creature must
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30012__Start"/>this<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30012__End"/>
he <lb n="c57-0170__main__16"/>have been in
his
days of
prosperity
when <lb n="c57-0170__main__17"/>he is thus noble & godlike in
ruin â€“
He seems <lb n="c57-0170__main__18"/>to feel his own
worth
& the greatness of <lb n="c57-0170__main__19"/>his
fall. <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30024__Start"/>I have felt, said he, great &<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30024__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__20"/>When younger,
said he,
I
felt as if I
was
destin<lb n="c57-0170__main__21"/>ed for some great
enterprize.
My feelings <lb n="c57-0170__main__22"/>are
profound
but I possessed a coolness of
judge<lb n="c57-0170__main__23"/>ment
that fitted me for
greatenter<lb n="c57-0170__main__24"/>prises<lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/>illustrious <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/>atchievements.
This sentiment of the worth of my <lb n="c57-0170__main__25"/>nature supported
me
when others
would<lb n="c57-0170__main__26"/>have sunk
for I deemed it criminal <lb n="c57-0170__main__27"/>to throw away in useless
grief;
those ta<lb n="c57-0170__main__28"/>lents that might be useful to my
<lb n="c57-0170__main__29"/>fellow creatures â€“
When I reflected on the <lb n="c57-0170__main__30"/>work
that
I had
compleated,
no less a one <lb n="c57-0170__main__31"/>than the creation of a sensitive
&<lb n="c57-0170__main__32"/>rational animal
I could not rank my<lb n="c57-0170__main__33"/>self with the herd of common projectors. <lb n="c57-0170__main__34"/>But this
feeling
which supported me
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30108__Start"/>only<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30108__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__35"/>now
serves
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>only
to
<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30126__Start"/>sink<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30126__End"/>plunge
me lower in
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the dustâ€” All<lb n="c57-0171__main__1"/>my
speculations & hopes are as
nothing and
like the <lb n="c57-0171__main__2"/>Archangel who aspired to
omnipotence
I am
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30152__Start"/>now<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30152__End"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__3"/>chained
in an eternal hell. My imagination <lb n="c57-0171__main__4"/>was
vivid
yet my
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30160__Start"/>app<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30160__End"/>
powers of
application were
in<lb n="c57-0171__main__5"/>tense â€“
by the union of these qualities I
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30169__Start"/>ex<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30169__End"/>
conceived <lb n="c57-0171__main__6"/>the
idea
and executed the
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30175__Start"/>desig<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30175__End"/>
creation of a
manâ€“
<lb n="c57-0171__main__7"/>Even now I cannot
recollect
without
passion
<lb n="c57-0171__main__8"/>my reveries while the work was
incomplete â€“I
<lb n="c57-0171__main__9"/>trod heaven in my
thoughts â€“
now exulting <lb n="c57-0171__main__10"/>in my
powers â€“
now
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30186__Start"/>wi<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30186__End"/>
burning with the idea <lb n="c57-0171__main__11"/>of their
consequences.
From my infancy I was <lb n="c57-0171__main__12"/>imbued with high hopes and a lofty
ambition
<lb n="c57-0171__main__13"/>but how am I
sunk â€“ Oh
my
friend â€“
if you had <lb n="c57-0171__main__14"/>known me as I once
was <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30211__Start"/>who<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30211__End"/>
you would <lb n="c57-0171__main__15"/>not
recognize
me
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30216__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30216__End"/>
in this
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30221__Start"/>misery<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30221__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>state
of
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30230__Start"/>dgr<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30230__End"/> degradationDespon<lb n="c57-0171__main__16"/>dancy
rarely visited my
heart
a high destiny <lb n="c57-0171__main__17"/>seemed to bear me on,
untill
I
fell oh, never
<lb n="c57-0171__main__18"/>never
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>again
to
rise" <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30262__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30262__End"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__19"/>Must
I
lose this
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30272__Start"/>creature<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30272__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>admirable
being? I have <lb n="c57-0171__main__20"/>longed for a
friend,
I have sought one who would
sympathize
<lb n="c57-0171__main__21"/>with & love me.
Behold
on these
desart
seas <lb n="c57-0171__main__22"/>I have found
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30295__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30295__End"/>such an one â€“ but
I
fear
I have gained him
<lb n="c57-0171__main__23"/>but
to know his
value
& lose
him â€“I
would <lb n="c57-0171__main__24"/>reconcile him
with life
but he repulses the
<lb n="c57-0171__main__25"/>thought. "I
thank
you," Walton,"
he said,
but <lb n="c57-0171__main__26"/>When for
your kind intentions
towards
so <lb n="c57-0171__main__27"/>miserable a
wretch â€“
but when you speak <lb n="c57-0171__main__28"/>of new
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30324__Start"/>connections<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30324__End"/>ties and<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30334__Start"/>think<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30334__End"/>fresh affections
think you that any <lb n="c57-0171__main__29"/>can replace those
<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30348__Start"/>I have lost<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e30348__End"/>which
are gone? Can any man <lb n="c57-0171__main__30"/>be to me as Clerval
was
or any woman ano<lb n="c57-0171__main__31"/>ther
Elizabeth.
Even where the affections are <lb n="c57-0171__main__32"/>not strongly moved by any superior
excel<lb n="c57-0171__main__33"/>lence
the companions of our childhood al<lb n="c57-0172__main__1"/>ways possess a certain power over our
mind <lb n="c57-0172__main__2"/>that
hardly any
other
later friend can <lb n="c57-0172__main__3"/>obtain. They know our infantine
feelings <lb n="c57-0172__main__4"/>which
however they may be afterwards
<lb n="c57-0172__main__5"/>modified
are never
<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30396__Start"/>entirely changed<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30396__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>eradicated
and they <lb n="c57-0172__main__6"/>can judge of our actions with
greater <lb n="c57-0172__main__7"/>certainty â€“
A sister or
brother can never, un<lb n="c57-0172__main__8"/>less indeed such
symtoms
have been
shewn
<lb n="c57-0172__main__9"/>early
suspect the other of fraud or false
<lb n="c57-0172__main__10"/>dealing
when another
friend
however <lb n="c57-0172__main__11"/>strongly he may be
attatched may <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30429__Start"/>feel<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30429__End"/>be
in <lb n="c57-0172__main__12"/>spite of
himself
invaded
by
suspicion. <lb n="c57-0172__main__13"/>But I enjoyed
friends
dear not only
by <lb n="c57-0172__main__14"/>association
but
for their<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30443__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30443__End"/>
own
sake â€“and
<lb n="c57-0172__main__15"/>wherever I
am
the soothing voice of my
<lb n="c57-0172__main__16"/>Eliszabeth or
the conversation of
Cler<lb n="c57-0172__main__17"/>val
will be ever whispered
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in
my ear. <lb n="c57-0172__main__18"/>They are
dead
& but one feeling
